sqlMap.select: SELECT r.id_retro_document, r.id_owner, r.id_session, r.creation_date, r.last_modification_date, r.title, r.description, rda.id_user, s.description, s.date_session, s.theme, s.id_user as session_user_id, s.start_recording, s.isModel, su.id_user as id_attendee FROM retro_document r LEFT OUTER JOIN retro_document_access rda ON r.id_retro_document = rda.id_retro_document JOIN sessions s ON r.id_session = s.id_session LEFT OUTER JOIN session_users su ON su.id_session = s.id_session
